data.text: Didi diambu dimboti mu zitisa Yave
mu yamikisa luzolo luaku mu nsuka
mu miziki dikumi di minsinga, di siku beti tedila Lila
Bila ngeyo wumbonisa khini mu mavanga maku, a Yave.
A phila tola mavanga maku madi, a Yave,
muingi ka diambu ko batu bambimbi banyunduka banga biti,
Vayi ngeyo Yave widi wuyayusu mu zithangu zioso.
Buna meso mama mamona mbedosolo yi
Batu basonga bela mona mamboti banga diba,
bela buta mimbutu banza mu bununu buawu bu ngolo ;
